H3.text: who owns the majority of the us debt. Japan

A4.text: China is the second largest foreign creditor of the United States, after Japan.

A5.text: China remains a major holder of United States treasury securities, although the amount has decreased as of at least 2022.

A6.text: During Reagan's first term Japanese government and private investors held a third of the debt sold by the US Treasury
